summary: The diff shows InnovationsPage.tsx was updated to include per-innovation image paths, but the provided truncation does not show the card JSX actually rendering images or alt text, and no static image assets were added. There are also unrelated changes (Internet Identity hook) and an added project_state.json file not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each innovation card on frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx displays an image beside the innovation content (title/description), with responsive side-by-side on large screens and stacked layout on small screens, and each image has alt text matching the innovation title.
missing_requirements.reason: Although the innovations array includes an `image` field with the required `/assets/...` paths, the diff excerpt is truncated before the Card rendering and does not provide evidence that images are actually rendered next to the text, that the layout is responsive as specified, or that `alt` text is set on the images.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx (truncated before card JSX; shows `image: '/assets/...` fields only)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image files to frontend static assets (public assets) and reference them via absolute /assets/... paths.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show any added image files under a public/static assets directory (e.g., `frontend/public/assets/...`). Only code and metadata/text files are listed as added/modified.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx (references /assets/... but no corresponding asset additions shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated refactor/changes to Internet Identity hook (auth client/provider implementation details).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 and unrelated to adding innovation images/layout.
Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; appears to be meta/documentation rather than implementing innovation images.
Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; appears to be documentation/summary output rather than required functionality.
